All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Activity
Unimplemented Object representing an activity in the WolfScheduler with a title and meeting days/times.
ArrayList<E>
Custom ArrayList that doesn't allow for null elements or duplicate elements
ArrayQueue<E>
A Queue data structure that implements the functionality of an ArrayList.
ArrayStack<E>
Implements stack interface list using ArrayList
Conflict
A class implementing conflict must have the ability to check if two members are unable to be valid at the same time and throw a ConflictException if so.
ConflictException
To ensure that the WolfScheduler client handles possible schedule conflicts, ConflictException is thrown by implementations of the Conflict interface.
Course
Extension of Activity representing a course in the WolfScheduler with a specific section, instructor, and meeting times.
CourseCatalog
Defines functionality to build a catalog of available courses.
CourseCatalogPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the CourseCatalog.
CourseNameValidator
This class contains a FSM used to verify that a created course has a valid name.
CourseNameValidatorFSM
Finite State Machine for checking whether a Course's Name is valid.
CourseRecordIO
Static methods for reading Course records from text files and writing a set of Course records to a file.
CourseRoll
Represents the roll of a class.
Faculty
The faculty class maintains information about a given faculty's first names, last names, ids, emails, passwords, and max number of courses.
FacultyDirectory
Maintains a directory of all faculty at NC State.
FacultyDirectoryPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the FacultyDirectory.
FacultyRecordIO
Defines functionality that enables faculty records to be read from and written to a file
FacultySchedule
A Faculty's schedule
InvalidTransitionException
This checked exception is thrown in the case of an invalid transitions so that clients of the CourseNameFSM must prevent or handle them.
LinkedAbstractList<E>
Implements the functionality of a generic AbstractList with a linked list.
LinkedList<E>
This is a LinkedList class which inherits AbstractSequentialList to provide functionality for all standard list methods by implementing them in terms of an Iterator
LinkedListRecursive<E>
Linked List implementation using recursion
LinkedQueue<E>
A Queue data structure that implements the functionality of a LinkedList.
LinkedStack<E>
Implements stack interface list using LinkedAbstractList
PackSchedulerGUI
Main GUI for the PackScheduler project.
Queue<E>
The Queue interface
RegistrationManager
Manages registration process and contains registrar inner class.
Schedule
List of courses that a user is enrolled in.
Stack<E>
Interface for Stack list concept
Student
The student class maintains information about a given student's first names, last names, ids, emails, passwords, and max credits.
StudentDirectory
Maintains a directory of all students enrolled at NC State.
StudentDirectoryPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the StudentDirectory.
StudentRecordIO
Defines functionality that enables student records to be read from and written to a file
StudentRegistrationPanel
Creates a user interface for students to register for classes.
User
Represents a user, has subclasses Student and Faculty
